```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

# clean environment 
rm(list = ls())

# set working directory to the `practical/` folder 
wd = '~/Documents/GitHub/practical/'
setwd(wd)

# load libraries and functions
scripts = paste0(wd, 'Code/Functions/', list.files('Code/Functions/'))
lapply(scripts, source)

# load data in the output folder 
files = list.files(path = paste0(wd, 'Code/Run_output'), full.names = TRUE, pattern = "*.rds")
outputs = list()
for (file in files){
  outputs[[sub('.*/', '', file)]] = readRDS(file)
}
```
